text: James Fred Hofheinz (born March 15, 1938) is an American lawyer and Democratic politician. He was the 55th mayor of Houston, Texas from 1974 to 1978. Hofheinz's father, Roy, was mayor of the city in the 1950s. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hofheinz, Mayor Fred and Frank Michel. Mayor Fred Hofheinz Oral History , Houston Oral History Project, February 11, 2008. title: Fred Hofheinz
